Intercontinental: Bradley International Airport is your best bet - about an hour away from Barkhamsted. 
Route 44, 318, 181 all run through Barkhamsted. 
Route 8 will take you to Winsted which neighbors Barkhamsted.

Rent a car! The only way to get around is by car. Of course during the summer months, many a bicycler can be found on the roads, taking in the natural beauty along the Wild and Scenic Farmington River.

The Gatehouse on Route 318 as you cross the Saville Dam.

The First Congregational Church off of Center Hill Road.
